title: Complacent Tories are taking a dangerous risk in assuming that Corbyn is a busted flush
text:
Remain politicians have successfully (perhaps) hog-tied the prime minister. They have ensured that he must ask for an extension to the UK’s membership of the EU rather than leave without a deal. They have inflicted a series of humiliating defeats on him in Parliament and they have deprived him of the wafer-thin majority he inherited from his predecessor.

Boris Johnson has been accused by the highest court in the land of unlawfully proroguing Parliament, the press are still hounding him over a relationship he may or may not have had with someone or other and he is regularly and publicly vilified as extreme, a racist and a clown.

Despite all this, Tory activists might be forgiven for having a spring...
description: Remain politicians have successfully (perhaps) hog-tied the prime minister.
